Class.ClassComment: ClientListener /** * Annotation that marks a class to receive remote events from Hot Rod caches. Classes with this annotation are expected to have at least one callback annotated with one of the events it can receive: {@link org.infinispan.client.hotrod.annotation.ClientCacheEntryCreated}, {@link org.infinispan.client.hotrod.annotation.ClientCacheEntryModified}, {@link org.infinispan.client.hotrod.annotation.ClientCacheEntryRemoved}, {@link org.infinispan.client.hotrod.annotation.ClientCacheFailover} * @author Galder Zamarre√±o */
